means: 不加批评地，不加鉴别地

sentence.Network_en: Politicians want a lap-dog press which will uncritically report their propaganda.
sentence.Network_cn: 政客们想要的是不问是非、甘为他们搞宣传的哈巴狗一样的新闻媒体。

sentence.Network_en: It's no good taking over the experience of foreign countries uncritically.
sentence.Network_cn: 决不可生吞活剥地搬用外国的经验.
不要不加批判地接受一切.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Character  - Chinese Character Dictionary... ... 抽筋剥皮[ pull out a tendon and skin] 生吞活剥[ uncritically].
he accepted her decisions uncritically ., 他不加批判地接受了她的决定.
It favours free markets , but not uncritically , and is concerned to mitigate inequality ., 它赞成自由市场 , 但并非不加批判 . 它着意减轻社会不平等现象.
Those who defend the Palestinians uncritically are enablers of murder ., 那些捍卫巴勒斯坦人谁无批判地是谋杀引擎.

list.abs: news sources reflected uncritical estimates of the number of juvenile addicts ., 新闻的原始资料反映出对青少年吸毒人数的盲目估计.
It favours free markets , but not uncritically , and is concerned to mitigate inequality ., 它赞成自由市场 , 但并非不加批判 . 它着意减轻社会不平等现象.
This was an uncritical survey ., 这是一个不中肯的概括.
a devoted and almost uncritical admirer ., 忠实 , 近乎盲目的崇拜者.

entry.tran: (人或行为)不加辨别的，不加批判的
entry.def: If you describe a person or their behaviour as uncritical, you mean that they do not judge whether someone or something is good or bad, right or wrong, before supporting or believing them.

example.ex: ...the conventional notion of women as uncritical purchasers of heavily advertised products.
example.tran: 认为女人会不加辨别地购买那些大做广告的产品的传统观点

auth_sentence.content: I would presume from this that you uncritically accept the universal-expansion interpretation.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: I would presume from this that you uncritically accept the universal-expansion interpretation.

auth_sentence.content: Shermer's last paragraph shows how he buys into this thought process uncritically.
auth_sentence.res_content: Shermer's last paragraph shows how he buys into this thought process uncritically.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Shermer's last paragraph shows how he buys into this thought process uncritically.

auth_sentence.content: Can you please provide evidence that the physics community accepted those results uncritically?
auth_sentence.res_content: Can you please provide evidence that the physics community accepted those results uncritically?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Can you please provide evidence that the physics community accepted those results uncritically?
